content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Plate Factory at position (52, -80)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position (52.0, -80.0)) with fuel source and iron plate production
- Furnace (position (62.0, -54.0)) with fuel source and iron plate production
- BeltGroup (position (51.5, -84.5) to (53.5, -78.5)) that connects the furnaces to transport iron plates
- BurnerInserter (position (53.5, -78.5)) that picks up iron plates from the furnace and puts them onto the transport belt

### Coal Supply at position (52, -82)
Consists of following entities
- Chest (position (52.5, -82.5)) that stores coal
- BeltGroup (position (51.5, -84.5) to (53.5, -78.5)) that connects the chest to the furnaces to supply coal

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has produced the required items before attempting to extract them
- Check that the furnace has enough fuel to produce the required items
- Make sure to extract items from the furnace before they are used up or removed by other entities

### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Ensure that the tile is empty before attempting to place an entity on it
- Check that the entity is not being placed on top of another entity

### NAMESPACE
- No utility functions have been defined by the agent
- Important variables:
  - `transport-belt`: 150
  - `burner-inserter`: 9
  - `burner-mining-drill`: 1
  - `wood`: 2
  - `coal`: 1082
  - `stone`: 5
  - `iron-ore`: 2048
  - `iron-plate`: 1100
